NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Warehouse and column Retail is the flow between 111 and 143? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 138 and 157? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Regional Warehouse A to node City Supermarket and from node Cold Storage to node City Supermarket, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Regional Warehouse A} to node {City Supermarket} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Packaging Line to node Regional Warehouse A, from node Regional Warehouse A to node City Supermarket, and from node Test Facility to node Cold Storage, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Regional Warehouse A} to node {City Supermarket} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Component Assembly to node Spare Parts Depot, from node Cold Storage to node Convenience Store, and from node Cold Storage to node Outlet Mall, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Component Assembly} to node {Spare Parts Depot} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Retail of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Retail is {City Supermarket}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Component Assembly to target node Convenience Store? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Component Assembly to node Convenience Store is: {Component Assembly, Bulk Storage, Convenience Store}.
